description:
Are you a busy, multi-tasking parent with limited time? Do you feel your kid(s) are living as healthy and having as much fun you had as a kid? With today's rapid technological advances that kids are becoming hooked to, chances are your kids are not.

We are here to teach you quick and easy tools to help your kid(s) become healthier and more active in a fun way!

Active Kids will educate you on active healthy living ideas for your kids through various categories including:

  • introductory sports
  • nutrition
  • motivation tips
  • independent and group activities
  • birthday party activities
  • how to look after you pet
  • playing instruments, etc.

You can even rely on us for new and on trend activities!
title: Active Kids
instructors: Ashley Collins, James Carroll, Kia Ruiz, Reni Zuavollo
